    • Uses of Action in com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

      Subinterfaces of Action in com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SerializableAction<T>
      In the case where the application is clustered, to call App's methods retrieving session like App.all(Action), action to be passed should be able to be serialized.
